src:
Zoir Mirzayev Qarshi shahar Obodonlashtirish bosh boshqarmasiga kutilmaganda tashrif buyurdi (foto)

05 Nov 2019, 22:08

Qashqadaryo viloyat hokimi vazifasini bajaruvchi Zoir Mirzayev boshchiligidagi ishchi guruh 5-noyabr, seshanba kuni kutilmaganda Qarshi shahar hokimligi huzuridagi Obodonlashtirish bosh boshqarmasi binosiga kirib bordi. Bu haqda viloyat hokimligi matbuot xizmati xabar berdi.


Foto: Qashqadaryo viloyat hokimligi matbuot xizmati

Xabar berilishicha, Zoir Mirzayev shahar obodligini mazkur boshqarmadan boshlash kerakligini, o‘zi “obodonlashtirishga muhtoj” bo‘lgan tashkilot shaharga kerak emasligini aytgan.


Foto: Qashqadaryo viloyat hokimligi matbuot xizmati



Foto: Qashqadaryo viloyat hokimligi matbuot xizmati

Boshqarma rahbariyatiga kamchiliklarni bartaraf etish uchun bir hafta muddat belgilandi. Ham boshqarma binosi, ham shahar obodligiga qarab xulosa qilinishi alohida ta’kidlandi.


Foto: Qashqadaryo viloyat hokimligi matbuot xizmati



Foto: Qashqadaryo viloyat hokimligi matbuot xizmati



Foto: Qashqadaryo viloyat hokimligi matbuot xizmati



Foto: Qashqadaryo viloyat hokimligi matbuot xizmati



Foto: Qashqadaryo viloyat hokimligi matbuot xizmati


Mavzuga doir: 


Zoir Mirzayev Qashqadaryo viloyat hokimi vazifasini bajaruvchi etib tayinlandi


Qashqadaryoning yangi tayinlangan rahbari Zoir Mirzayev birinchi ish kunida nimalar qildi? (foto)


Zoir Mirzayev muammolarni o‘rganish uchun tunda shahar aylandi (video)
text:
Zoir Mirzaev unexpectedly visited headquarters of Karshi city (photo)

05 Nov 2019, 22:08

Working group headed by acting governor of Kashkadarya region Zoir Mirzaev on Tuesday November 5 unexpectedly entered the building of the Main Department of Improvement under Karshi city administration. The press service of the regional administration reports.


Photo: Press Service of Kashkadarya Regional Hokimiyat

Reportedly, Zoir Mirzayev said that the city should begin its development from this department and that the city does not need an organization that "needs improvement."


Photo: Press Service of Kashkadarya Regional Hokimiyat



Photo: Press Service of Kashkadarya Regional Hokimiyat

The management of the department was given one week to address the deficiencies. It was emphasized that conclusions should be drawn from both the administrative buildings and the city's prosperity.


Photo: Press Service of Kashkadarya Regional Hokimiyat



Photo: Press Service of Kashkadarya Regional Hokimiyat



Photo: Press Service of Kashkadarya Regional Hokimiyat



Photo: Press Service of Kashkadarya Regional Hokimiyat



Photo: Press Service of Kashkadarya Regional Hokimiyat
